word_mean: 抗原：指在合适条件下，能诱导特异性免疫反应并能与该反应的产物，如特异性抗体或特异性致敏T-淋巴细胞，或与两者起反应的物质。抗原可以是可溶性物质，如毒素和异种蛋白
或为颗粒，如细菌和组织细胞
但只有称为抗原决定簇的蛋白质部分或多糖分子才与抗体或淋巴细胞上的特异性受体结合。缩写为Ag
能激发机体产生体液免疫或（和）细胞免疫，且能与免疫应答的产物（抗体或致敏淋巴细胞）相结合并发生反应的物质。

sentence.Network_en: Antigen interacts with the surface of sensitized mast cells.
sentence.Network_cn: 抗原与致敏的肥大细胞表面互相作用.

sentence.Network_en: Another method of maintaining antigen persistence is through use of an adjuvant.
sentence.Network_cn: 使用佐剂是保持抗原持续存留的另一方法.

sentence.Network_en: Antigen density on the tumor cell surface influences the cytotoxic sensitivity.
sentence.Network_cn: 瘤细胞表面的抗原密度影响细胞毒的敏感性.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 抗原（antigen）是一类能刺激机体的免疫系统，使之发生免疫应答，产生抗体与致敏淋巴细胞等，并能与相应抗体或致敏淋巴细胞在 …
CD122 - 供应信息 - 丁香通 ... 保  质  期: 18 month 抗原来源: antigen 规格:  0.25mg.

objective To investigate the pre valence of HCV core antigen in blood donors with negative HCV antibody and evaluate the residual risk of post transfusion infection HCV after HCV antibody detect ion .目的观察丙型肝炎病毒（HCV)抗体阴性献血人群HCV核心抗原的流行情况，初步评估经HCV抗体检测后输血传播HC

objective To investigate the effect of prostate specific antigen ( PSA ) and levels of sex hormones as well as prostatic acid phosphatase ( PAP ) on prostatic size .目的探讨前列腺特异性抗原(sa)性激素及酸性磷酸酶(PAP)不同年龄组与前列腺体积的变化关系。

list.abs: ... 4抗原的分类根据抗原性质分为两类,完全抗原和不完全抗原,淋巴细胞的转化完全抗原,complete antigen,简称抗原,是一类既有免疫原性,又有免疫反应性的物质,如大多数蛋白质,细菌,病毒, <a.
抗原决定簇（antigenic determinant）：决定抗原性的特殊化学基团。一般抗原决定簇是由6－12氨基酸或碳水基团组成，它可以是由 …
移植抗原又称组织相容性抗原(histocompatibility antigen)。组织相容性是指不同个体间进行器官移植时移植物被宿主(受体)能否“容忍”的.
抗原修复（antigen retrieval）是指通过化学或物理方法暴露抗原决定簇，使抗原恢复原有的空间。抗原修复一般分为两类：化学修复 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: via German from French antigène (see anti-, -gen)

entry.def: An antigen is a substance that helps the production of antibodies.

means.word_mean: 1. any substance (as a toxin or enzyme) that stimulates the production of antibodies

auth_sentence.content: If a helper cell recognises an antigen, it becomes activated.
auth_sentence.res_content: If a helper cell recognises an antigen, it becomes activated.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If a helper cell recognises an antigen, it becomes activated.

auth_sentence.content: If there is no antigen-presenting cell, there is no immune response.
auth_sentence.res_content: If there is no antigen-presenting cell, there is no immune response.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If there is no antigen-presenting cell, there is no immune response.

auth_sentence.content: Whether the antigen is introduced via injection vs. natural exposure is irrelevant.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whether the antigen is introduced via injection vs. natural exposure is irrelevant.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whether the antigen is introduced via injection vs. natural exposure is irrelevant.
